strategy.title: How M+ Scoring Works
steps: Each dungeon awards score based on key level and time
Timing the key gives full score; depleting gives reduced score
You need 2000+ total rating for Keystone Master
Both Fortified and Tyrannical weeks count - do each dungeon on both

strategy.title: Efficient Path to 2000
steps: Aim for +15 timed on all dungeons on both affix weeks
Start with dungeons you know well, build confidence
A +15 timed gives roughly 125 points per dungeon per affix

strategy.title: Tips for Timing Keys
steps: Learn dungeon routes - use Mythic Dungeon Tools addon
Communicate kicks and stops with your group
Bring consumables: food, flasks, potions, health stones
Use Raider.IO addon to find experienced groups
